title.rendered: Build to Sell Your Amazon Business –  with Dave Storey of AFBTS Part 1

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 31:38 — 29.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 31:38 — 29.0MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Dave Storey started as a design engineer. Since selling his first FBA business and realizing how much value can be added by optimizing for maximum saleablity, he pursued the industry.

Click Here to get the Exit Plan 55-point Checklist for FREE.

You’ll Learn: 

  • The underlying problem Dave sees with Amazon business owners
  • Why exit strategies matter
  • The upsides of getting it right 
  • That the best time to think about the end goal is at the start of the business
  • Why creating a sellable asset outweighs just making a ton of cash
